definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: What are the currency pairs and time frames that BURU trades on?
sentences.chinese: BURU交易时间图表以及货币对是什么？

sentences.english: Many of these can be derived from the schematics or the memory configuration of your target hardware.
sentences.chinese: 许多这些可以来源于图表或对内存配置的目标硬件。
小心图表建造者创造的幻觉。

sentences.english: We will stick with the two-dimensional charts for this example.
sentences.chinese: 对于本示例来说，我们将使用二维图表。

sentences.english: Look at these new configurations for the computers we’re installing. Now ... notice that ...
sentences.chinese: 你看这些电脑的配置图表。

sentences.english: After the individual components were graphed, it was easy to spot this problem.
sentences.chinese: 在对各个组件绘制图表之后，很容易确定此问题。

sentences.english: For example, the charting widget has a tests directory that contains code to get you started.
sentences.chinese: 例如，图表小部件的测试目录包含入门代码。

sentences.english: Cook up some automatically generated graphs for your organizational meetings or live enterprise directory data.
sentences.chinese: 为公司会议或实时企业目录数据打造自动生成的图表。

sentences.english: Please continue with the diagramming section below.
sentences.chinese: 请继续阅读下面的图表部分。

sentences.english: Close and save the sequence diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 关闭并保存这个序列图表。

sentences.english: The album's title track is climbing high on the Country chart.
sentences.chinese: 这张专辑的主打歌，是对国家攀登高图表。

sentences.english: Today's chart of the day unites these two popular topics.
sentences.chinese: 今天的“今日图表”将汇总这两个时兴话题。

sentences.english: Now you just need to turn it into a chart.
sentences.chinese: 现在您只需要将其转变为图表。

sentences.english: Figures and diagrams are based on the textbook Essential Psychopharmacology, c1996.
sentences.chinese: 数字和图表是基于教科书的基本精神药理学，时限。

sentences.english: On the class diagram, select the type for which you want to view the base class or interface.
sentences.chinese: 在类别图表上，选取要检视其基底类别或介面的型别。

sentences.english: What the chart reveals is indeed thought-provoking.
sentences.chinese: 图表揭示的内容确实令人深思。
